name: The cloak of the bat
data: It increases the users strength pitifully.
It increases the users dexterity pitifully.
It increases the users constitution pitifully.
It increases the users wisdom a tiny bit.
It increases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It has adequate armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
